description:
Brody is OK with the idea of getting head from another guy, but he hasn't quite made up his mind about the whole fucking thing. For a straight guy who's never had an all-male blowjob, Brody was remarkably calm when I hooked him up with Diego P., a hot Latin guy who contacted us through the site about participating in a shoot.
Diego told me after the shoot that he completely lost himself in Brody's delicious ass... except for one very funny incident, which is included in a series of outtakes at the end.
At any rate, Brody is a consistent cummer and delivers two incredible loads in this video!
title: Blowing Brody
